mapper.sql: with tmp_table as ( select c.mega_cd, c.mega_nm, a.cty_cd, b.cty_nm , a.admi_cd as id , a.admi_cd , a.admi_nm , a.minx , a.miny , a.maxx , a.maxy , a.centerx , a.centery , a.geom , a.feature from tbshp_admi_features a left join tbadm_cty b on a.cty_cd = b.cty_cd left join tbshp_mega c on b.mega_cd = c.mega_cd )
